'''Emerald Orb''' is a 3-Star [[catalyst]].

==Description==
A lightweight catalyst carved out of emerald-green jade. It is durable and affordable, which makes it a popular item all around.<br>
Small but exquisitely made, it is referred to by the people of Liyue as the "jade ball."<br>
It is a highly efficient defensive Catalyst as well as a good-looking accessory.
